general.support:
If you have any questions,
we are happy to help you at [mail:support@dfx.swiss].
general.thanks: Thank you very much for your trust
general.personal_questions: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

login.title: DFX Login
login.message: Click on the following link to log in to DFX [url:hier].

initiated.title: Funds received
initiated.next_step: Next Step: We are going to sell your funds and exchange them into your desired currency and keep you updated with further emails.

exchanged.title: Funds sold
exchanged.next_step: Next Step: We sold your funds and are now preparing the bank transfer. Once the money is sent out of our bank account you will receive the final wire-transfer email.

processed.title: Bank transfer arranged
processed.salutation: We have arranged the bank transfer
processed.next_step: The payment has just left our bank account and will be visible on your bank account shortly. In the meantime the bank performances are responsible for the wire transfer duration. Thank you for using the DFX withdrawal service.

buy_fiat.payment_link: Here you can find the transaction ID with your withdrawal: [url:Link]

buy_crypto.title: Deposit processed
buy_crypto.salutation: Your deposit has been successfully processed
buy_crypto.payment_link: Here you can find the transaction ID with your payout: [url:Link]

fiat.title: Funds have been reimbursed
fiat.salutation: Your funds have been reimbursed to your bank account

crypto.title: Funds have been reimbursed
crypto.salutation: Your funds have been reimbursed to your wallet address
crypto.payment_link:
Here you can find the transaction ID
for your reimbursement: [url:Link]

return.introduction:
Reason why we reimbursed your funds:
{reason}

reasons.daily_limit: You exceeded the limit without KYC
reasons.user_data_mismatch: Your name you provided to DFX does not match the name of the owner of the IBAN
reasons.iban_check: The IBAN cannot be used with DFX
reasons.name_check: For legal reasons we can not serve you as a customer
reasons.olky_no_kyc: You have to complete KYC for DFX in order to use Olkypay Bank
reasons.min_deposit_not_reached: The minimum deposit limit was not reached
reasons.name_check_without_kyc: Your transaction was cancelled due to missing KYC
reasons.annual_limit_without_kyc: You exceeded the annual limit without KYC
reasons.asset_currently_not_available: The asset is currently not available for trading with DFX
reasons.staking_discontinued: Staking deposits are no longer possible

daily_limit.title: 24h limit exceeded
daily_limit.salutation: You have exceeded your 24h volume limit
daily_limit.line1: Please verify yourself by KYC (know your customer) to increase your limit.
daily_limit.line2: After a successful KYC we proceed with your transaction.
daily_limit.line3: Without verification, your money will be automatically returned after 7 days.
daily_limit.line4:
Increase the limit by KYC?
Click [url:here] to start the KYC process.
daily_limit.line5:
Alternatively, you can also use the DFX app on your payment page,
click on the red arrow next to "Your limit"
and start the verification.

annual_limit.title: Annual limit exceeded
annual_limit.salutation: You have exceeded your yearly volume limit
annual_limit.line1: Please apply for a new annual limit.
annual_limit.line2:
Once the new limit has been approved,
we proceed with your transaction.
annual_limit.line4: Open the payment page via "My DFX" in the DFX App.
annual_limit.line5:
Go to the red arrow under "Your limit" and
request a new desired limit.

annual_limit_without_kyc.title: Pending transaction - annual limit exceeded without KYC
annual_limit_without_kyc.salutation: You have exceeded your yearly volume limit without KYC
annual_limit_without_kyc.line1: Dear valued customer, many thanks for your trust in DFX AG.
annual_limit_without_kyc.line2: Unfortunately, we cannot process without a full verification as you exceed your annual limit.
annual_limit_without_kyc.line3: We therefore ask you to use this link [url:here]  to perform KYC with your ID card.
annual_limit_without_kyc.line4:
Alternatively, you can also use the DFX app on your payment page
to click on the red arrow next to "Your limit"
and start KYC.
annual_limit_without_kyc.line5: If you do not want to carry out the verification, the money will be returned fully automatically after 7 days.

olky_no_kyc.title: KYC required to use SEPA instant wire transfers
olky_no_kyc.salutation: Verification by KYC is required to use our bank in Luxembourg
olky_no_kyc.line1: In order to use our bank account in Luxembourg with the SEPA Instant function, full verification is unfortunately mandatory.
olky_no_kyc.line2: We therefore ask you to use this link [url:here] to perform KYC with your ID card.
olky_no_kyc.line3:
Alternatively, you can also use the DFX app on your payment page
to click on the red arrow next to "Your limit"
and start KYC.
olky_no_kyc.line4: Without verification, you can continue to use our bank account from Switzerland up to EUR 1,000 per day without KYC via standard Sepa.
olky_no_kyc.line5: If you do not want to carry out the verification, the money will be returned fully automatically after 7 days.

name_check_without_kyc.title: KYC required to execute your pending transaction
name_check_without_kyc.salutation: Your pending transaction needs a full KYC verification before execution
name_check_without_kyc.line1: Dear valued customer, many thanks for your trust in DFX AG.
name_check_without_kyc.line2: Unfortunately, we cannot process your order without a full verification (KYC).
name_check_without_kyc.line3: We therefore ask you to use this link [url:here] to perform KYC with your ID card.
name_check_without_kyc.line4:
Alternatively, you can also use the DFX app on your payment page
to click on the red arrow next to "Your limit"
and start KYC.
name_check_without_kyc.line5: If you do not want to carry out the verification, the money will be returned fully automatically after 7 days.

referral.title: Payout Referral Rewards
referral.salutation: Your referral rewards have been paid out
referral.payment_link: Here you can find the transaction ID for your referral payout: [url:Link]
referral.dfx_ambassador: You are a true DFX Ambassador - thanks for spreading the word of DFX!

failed.title: Identification failed
failed.message: We have noticed that your identification has failed. Please try it again with the following URL: [url:here]

reminder.title: Complete verification
reminder.message: We have noticed that you have not completed your verification.

kyc.next_step: To start the online identification process, click on the refresh button in the limit section on the payment page (access via the "My DFX" button in the app) or [url:here].
kyc.last_step: Take the final step and start working on your financial freedom today

link_address.title: Ligar o seu endereço
link_address.salutation: Deseja ligar o seu endereço à sua conta existente?
link_address.message: Se quiser ligar o seu novo endereço à sua conta existente e já verificada, por favor siga as instruções: [url:kliknij tutaj]

limit_request.title: Transaction volume approved
limit_request.message: Your request of {limitAmount} EUR transaction volume has been approved and is now freely available to you.

black_squad.title: Invitation Black Squad
black_squad.line1: first of all I would like to introduce myself. My name is Oli and I am CMO at DFX.swiss.
black_squad.line2: For some time now, we have been maintaining a Telegram group for people with larger investments via DFX.swiss and would like to offer you with this group
black_squad.line3:
• provide a direct mouthpiece to the C-Level of DFX
  • provide a platform for discussions
  • listen closely to your requests for new services
  • and introduce you to new topics and services in advance
black_squad.line4: We would be pleased if you would like to join this group.
black_squad.line5: We have provided you with direct access to this group on your personal DFX Payment page. Just click on MyDFX in the DFX app and follow the link.
black_squad.closing:
Thank you for your trust in us.
Oli
